title: Drawing, "Design for Series of Panels for Metropolitan Life Insurance Co., New York"
title_raw: Design for Series of Panels for Metropolitan Life Insurance Co., New York
medium: Red, orange, yellow, green and blue watercolor over graphite
signed: Signed on the original cardboard backing (now separate from the main sheet) in blue pen: Arthur Crisp
inscribed:
Inscribed at lower left in blue watercolor: ARTUR CRISP
Inscribed along right margin, vertically in graphite: PERSIAN DANCE
Inscription on the original cardboard backing: a sketch of plan in graphite; inscription across in blue pen: sketch for series of panels for Metropolitan Life Insurance Co. New York City / to Miss Beer with regards and deep appreciation of her work in the world of art/ Arthur Crisp [signature]
description: In the foreground stands a couple in a dancing pose.  They are dressed in exotic costumes.  A dog sits to the left of them.  In the middleground, at the left hand side, three musicians play instruments.  At the right hand side, a man carries a tray with fruit.  Behind the man with the tray is a tree with white-blue blossoms.  In the background, at the left hand side, stands a man holding a horse.  To the right of him stands a female figure.  At her feet sit two other female figures.  A hilly landscape is visible in the distance.  The entire scene is framed by a curtain.  At the bottom of the sheet, there is a suggestion of the wall molding, rendered in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Series of Panels for Metropolitan Life Insurance Co., New York". Red, orange, yellow, green and blue watercolor over graphite. 1982-12-1.
